overview.description: Manage client profiles, groups, contacts, and portal access for your legal practice
overview.whatItDoes: Centralized client database with GSTIN autofill, contact management, group organization, and secure portal access for client self-service
overview.whyItMatters: Accurate client data is foundational to case management, billing, communications, and compliance. Errors here cascade to all downstream modules.
keyBenefits: Single source of truth for client information
GSTIN autofill reduces data entry errors
Portal access gives clients visibility without admin overhead

create-client.title: Add New Client
create-client.description: Register a new client in the system with complete profile information
steps: Navigate to Clients from the sidebar
Select client type (Individual, Company, LLP, Partnership, Trust, etc.)
Enter display name (how client appears in dropdowns)
Enter GSTIN if applicable - system auto-fetches legal name and address
Fill PAN, contact email, phone, and address details
Assign to a client group if applicable
Set data scope (My Data, Team Data, or All Data visibility)
tips: Use GSTIN autofill for companies to ensure accuracy
Display name can be different from legal name for easier identification
Assign owner for data scope enforcement
warnings: Duplicate GSTIN/PAN will be flagged - check for existing records first
Client type cannot be changed after creation for compliance reasons

edit-client.title: Update Client Information
edit-client.description: Modify existing client profile, contacts, or settings
steps: Find the client using search or filters
Click on the client row to open details
tips: Changes to client name will reflect across all linked cases
Update address before GSTIN if address changed officially
warnings: Changing GSTIN triggers re-validation and may affect linked cases
Deactivating a client hides them from new case creation

add-contact.title: Add Client Contact
add-contact.description: Add authorized representatives, signatories, or key contacts for a client
steps: Enter contact name, designation, and role
Set as primary contact if applicable
Specify roles (Signatory, Authorized Rep, Billing Contact)
tips: Mark primary contacts for default communication
Signatories should match authorized signing authority
Add notes for contact preferences (e.g., 'Prefers WhatsApp')

manage-groups.title: Manage Client Groups
manage-groups.description: Organize clients into groups for portfolio management and reporting
steps: Click '+ New Group' to create a group
Enter group code, name, and description
Select head client (parent company) if applicable
Assign clients to the group from client profiles
tips: Use groups for corporate families or industry segments
Head client designation helps with consolidated reporting
Group-level reports show aggregate metrics

portal-access.title: Configure Client Portal Access
portal-access.description: Enable and manage secure portal access for client self-service
steps: User receives email with login instructions
tips: Viewer: Can see cases and documents, cannot upload
Editor: Can upload documents and add notes
Admin: Full access including user management
warnings: Portal access immediately grants visibility to all client cases
Deactivate access promptly when contacts leave the organization
securityConsiderations: Portal users can only see their own client's data
All portal activity is logged for audit

search-filter.title: Search and Filter Clients
search-filter.description: Find clients using various search criteria and filters
steps: Use the search bar for quick text search (name, GSTIN, PAN)
Apply filters for client type, status, group, or owner
Sort by name, creation date, or case count
Export filtered results to Excel if needed
tips: Partial GSTIN search works (e.g., first 5 digits)
Combine filters for precise results
Save frequently used filter combinations

import-clients.title: Bulk Import Clients
import-clients.description: Import multiple clients from Excel or CSV file
steps: Fill client data in the template
tips: Use template to ensure correct format
GSTIN validation runs automatically
Duplicates are flagged for review
warnings: Large imports may take time - do not close browser
Invalid GSTINs will be imported but flagged for correction

commonMistakes.mistake: Creating duplicate clients with slight name variations
commonMistakes.impact: Fragmented case history and billing records
commonMistakes.prevention: Always search by GSTIN/PAN before creating new clients

commonMistakes.mistake: Not updating contact information when staff changes
commonMistakes.impact: Communications go to wrong people, delays in case progress
commonMistakes.prevention: Quarterly review of client contacts, deactivate departed contacts

commonMistakes.mistake: Granting portal access without proper authorization
commonMistakes.impact: Unauthorized access to confidential case data
commonMistakes.prevention: Verify contact authority before enabling portal, use formal requests

commonMistakes.mistake: Incorrect GSTIN leading to wrong legal name autofill
commonMistakes.impact: Notices/documents have wrong party names, compliance issues
commonMistakes.prevention: Double-check GSTIN before accepting autofill, verify from official records

staff.focus: Client creation, contact updates, basic searches
staff.restrictions: Cannot modify client groups or portal settings
staff.tips: Always verify client data with source documents before entry

manager.focus: Client group management, data quality oversight, portal configuration
manager.permissions: Full client management including portal access
manager.tips: Review client data monthly, ensure contacts are current

admin.focus: Bulk operations, data import/export, system configuration
admin.permissions: All client operations including deletion and data migration
admin.tips: Audit portal access quarterly, enforce naming conventions

gstin.name: GSTIN Autofill
gstin.description: Automatic legal name and address fetch from government database
gstin.howToUse: Enter valid 15-digit GSTIN, click autofill icon, verify fetched data

caseManagement.name: Case Linking
caseManagement.description: Clients are linked to cases, changes propagate automatically
caseManagement.howToUse: Select client when creating case, client profile shows all linked cases

communications.name: Communication History
communications.description: All emails and messages to client are logged
communications.howToUse: View communications tab in client profile for full history

faqs.question: Can I merge duplicate client records?
faqs.answer: Not directly. Contact admin to manually consolidate records by moving cases and contacts to the primary client, then deactivating the duplicate.

faqs.question: How do I transfer a client to another owner?
faqs.answer: Edit the client profile, change the Owner field to the new user. This affects data scope visibility for My Data filters.

faqs.question: What happens when I deactivate a client?
faqs.answer: Deactivated clients are hidden from new case creation but existing cases remain accessible. Reactivate anytime from the client profile.
